body_html: @Oryak Same observation for the commit that causes the problem. However, the change you propose depends on the Bazel version. That will work before 0.3.1, if I am not mistaken (it may even be the 0.3.x series). From 0.3.1, cfg should be a string. See #4371 for related and recent activity.

That will work before 0.3.1, if I am not mistaken (it may even be the 0.3.x series). From 0.3.1, cfg should be a string. See #4371 for related and recent activity.
body: @Oryak Same observation for the commit that causes the problem. However, the change you propose depends on the Bazel version. That will work before 0.3.1, if I am not mistaken (it may even be the 0.3.x series). From 0.3.1, `cfg` should be a string. See #4371 for related and recent activity.
